title: Commonly used heart drug associated with increased risk of sudden cardiac arrest

title_detail.value: Commonly used heart drug associated with increased risk of sudden cardiac arrest

summary: A drug commonly used to treat high blood pressure and angina (chest pain) is associated with an increased risk of out-of-hospital sudden cardiac arrest, according to new results.

summary_detail.value: A drug commonly used to treat high blood pressure and angina (chest pain) is associated with an increased risk of out-of-hospital sudden cardiac arrest, according to new results.
